name: backendmusiclovelyhotmart
description: Backend API para o MusicLovely, construÃ­do com Fastify e TypeScript

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');console.log('Current directory:', process.cwd());console.log('Files in dist:', fs.existsSync('dist')?fs.readdirSync('dist').join(', '):'dist does not exist');const indexPath='dist/src/index.js';if(!fs.existsSync(indexPath)){console.error('ERROR: dist/src/index.js not found!');console.error('Full path checked:', path.resolve(indexPath));process.exit(1);}console.log('Build verified: dist/src/index.js exists at', path.resolve(indexPath));"

author: MusicLovely
